itemLabel: Liz Astor, Baroness Astor of Hever

wikipedia_page.main: Elizabeth Constance Mackintosh, Baroness Astor of Hever (born 4 May 1950) is an English author and autism activist. She is the second wife of John Astor, 3rd Baron Astor of Hever.
